name: Steve Brown
text: Was looking to trade in a old ring I had purchased from Kay to bring down the cost. Found the ring I wanted in the store and decided to think about it. After leaving checked Kay's website and found the same ring for the same cost without trading in my ring. First thing came to mind was "You Croaks". I almost gave you "CROAKS" my ring for nothing. BUYERS BEWARE THIS IS WHAT IT HAS COME TO.

name: Deanna Salazar
text: My husband wanting to surprise me for Christmas this year 2020 and doing so we went to Kay in Decatur on the 24th of December. We got there and he purchase me a beautiful ring-! The young lady Jasmine was working and was helping us to decide and making this the best experience ever-! With the holidays here Jasmine told us it would take about 2 plus weeks for it to be returned. I went into the storr tonight just to see if my ring was back and to my surprise it was-! With the holidays and everything it did take the 2 weeks-! Jasmine and the other young lady that night (Diana) was wonderful-! Jasmine tonight was wonderfule-! I recommend them to anyone-! Thanks again Jasmine

name: Sarah Blakely
text: I went to Google to get the store's number and saw the last 2 reviews and had to say something! We will be calling corporate as well! We NEVER go to the Decatur location, because of past experiences,  but recently we had a wedding to attend in town and stopped in. Jessica, the store Manager, was INCREDIBLE.  I had dreaded walking in and she immediately made us feel at home. The reason I am leaving a review is because not only was the man claiming a dispute with his credit company in there and behaving like an absolute juvenile, I fully believe the call she received from who I gathered (from eavesdropping tbh) was corporate was in regards to the man on here complaining about "an order." First of all, I am a retail manager as well. If I gave a return on a machine we sent somewhere for maintenance I would lose my job.  The man acted like a baby, and my husband was irate that a grown man should behave that way. The manager, though, was nothing less than professional,  and dealt with it better than I would have for sure! Secondly,  when I listened to her phone conversation about pendant man,  Jessica said more than once but shouldn't we do something for him, they hadn't found out if they could yet (or something like that.) All I thought that day was wow, people are so rude, and it's not even their fault. I never thought I would recommend the Decatur store, but 100% I recommend to everyone! The staff is nice, I actually trust them for once, and the manager Jessica is clearly willing to go above and beyond to try to help you even when you act like a total jerk to her. I admit even I kinda did at first, I just expected the kind of service that caused us to stop going there. Jessica if you see this, you have customers for life - The Blakely Family

name: corey house
text: Dishonest, no Integrity, and their word means nothing. Bought diamond earrings from Decatur, Al store and thought ordered custom diamond picture pendant to match earrings. After several assurances the piece could be made kay finally told me the piece couldn't be made but would not take earrings back because 30 day window passed for refund but it passed because I was waiting on pendant to be made. I did inform kay in beginning that I was getting earrings and pendant as set. They finally told me custom order was never put in is the reason for no refund which wasnt my fault. I don't work for kay and I don't know the protocol  but the store manager took my order or at least I thought and once they couldn't deliver they used a technicality to keep my money. They dont have the best merchandise anyway but make sure you cross your t's and dot your i's when dealing with them.

name: Chasity Warren
text: I had went to two different jewelers to order my daughter a class ring and no one seemed to care to help, just told to go online. I did not know her size and she was with me but no one seemed to want to help. Walked into Kay jewelers on 6th ave and it was totally different. They were super friendly and there’s was also online but she pulled it up and ordered it with me there and sized my daughter. We received it today and went in to pick up and love it and also the same friendliness. Thank you for being good at what you do!

name: Amanda Lambert
text: Me and my husband were at Kay Jewelers tonight. The gentleman that helped us was very pleasant. We had a great experience picking out my valentine’s present.

name: Paul Eichwurtzle
text: Friendly, thorough, professional service. Reasonable pricing.

name: Midnight_Rider 2020
text: Good and pretty jewelry

name: Jo Dumas
text: Bought a pocket watch for my son in law for his graduation from the police academy. Took it back there 2 times to have it engraved. They couldn't find the engraving paperwork both times. Thought since I purchased it there it wouldn't be a problem to have it engraved.Will be taking it somewhere else. Very unprofessional staff.

name: Ashlie Richie
text: I took my husbands wedding ring in to be sized and they told us to come back in two weeks to pick it up. When we got there to get his ring they couldn’t find it and asked us if we were sure it was this store that we used. Then they finally found it and the bag it was in had giant red writing on it that said “Have Not Paid”. I explained to the lady that when I bought the ring I also bought the warranty and that when they found us in the system two weeks prior that they said because I bought that we would not have to pay for it to be sized. She looked us up in the system and could not find us again. When we came in the first time they had trouble finding me in the system and the same lady took all my information and said she would update me in the computer so we would not have to go through all of that again. When I explained that, she laughed and said “Oh that was me haha I didn’t do it.” So they spend like 20 minutes just trying to find us in the computer and then acted like they didn’t want to give us our ring once they found us. We found out after we left that after all of that they did not even size it!! We definitely will NOT be coming back here.

name: Michael R
text: Gary, the manager, assured me my ring would be in the month before my wedding, and told me if he was ever out of the store his co-manager Cristy would take care of me. Nobody followed up with me regarding the ring or informed me they would not have it by the date we needed it. A week before the wedding date I called up to the store and was told Gary was out of town so I left my name and number and asked to have Cristy call me. No response. Two days later I called and again asked for Cristy by name. The girl came back to the phone and said Cristy did not call me back because Gary knew about my account, not her. She didn't take my call. We did not have a ring on the wedding date, we couldn't even talk to anybody who knew the status. I finally received the ring, well past the wedding date, about twice as long as Gary told me it would take. Gary repeatedly blamed the shop for not having or knowing about my ring. When I picked up the ring I told Gary they dropped the ball and I felt like they should adjust the price of the ring - or do something to make it right. Gary looked me in the eyes and told me "I will go to bat for you" in regards to making it right, he said he would contact me in a few days. After a month I called Gary back today to ask for his district managers number, in hopes of finally getting a resolution. Gary said to me, "I thought we were done when you picked up your ring". A far cry from going to bat for me like he said he would. I feel like Gary intentionally lied to me to get rid of me. I closed my account and wont do business with Kay or Gary or Cristy again.

name: Zach Richie
text: Not good service. Didnt believe we bought my wedding band there even though it was in the computer. Took it to get sized and it was never sized. The woman claimed we didn't have warranty on the ring and almost refused to give it to me. They finally found it in the computer and saying it wasn't purchased there and they pulled it up 2 weeks before hand. Will take my business elsewhere.

name: Captain_Redpill
text: Ever since the store changed locations and employees the only kiss that begins with this Kay's is kiss customer appreciation and service goodbye.

name: farrah derusseaux
text: Awesome, Excellent Customer Service

name: Landon Smith
text: Love the staff here! Very friendly and helpful.

name: Ashley Kirby
text: I had the worst experience ever with this store. I took my engagement ring in for its 6 month checkup and to go down a quarter of a size. They told me to come back in two weeks and it will be here. So two weeks later we go in to get it and it’s been ruined when they went to go down a half a size. Had a huge gash in it, popped out two big diamonds and a diamond on the side. We were heartbroken, they also told us that it was a discontinued ring so they couldn’t reorder another ring and to pick another ring. So I spent a couple days looking and just couldn’t find any ring that I liked. So I ended up going to the Kay’s in bridgestreet and instantly falling in love with one. Told them the situation and they were so shocked. They said they had never had a ring be sent off and be ruined at their store. They told me to tell Decatur which one I wanted and they could have it ordered. So my fiancé called Decatur asking if they could have it in my size and ordered and the girl said absolutely you can, come tomorrow and we will have it all ready for you. Well we go the next day and the girls calling all these places just to come back to me to say we can’t get your ring in a size for you so pick another ring. I was so upset. They ruined my ring, then told me the night before they could just to have me go all the way to the store to tell me no they can’t pick another one. I was so angry I ended up leaving. I later in the week went back to the bridestreet and they were so shocked with Decatur’s performance to us, they said we can absolutely get you the ring you want in the size you need and they were confused why Decatur told us we couldn’t. They told us to go into Decatur, get our ring and walk out and call customer service. So we did and the store manager himself fixed us up at bridgestreet with the ring we wanted, plus the band, the size we wanted, and ensured us it would be in two weeks in time for engagement pictures. Yesterday my ring came in, it’s absolutely perfect!! It just goes to show Decatur is very unprofessional, their workers are unskilled and the store manager not once came to handle the situation or talked to us about it even when we were two feet away from her. Decatur has forever lost my service and bridestreet will forever by my hero’s who came in and cleaned up their mess.

name: Brandi Perry
text: Sandy, the store manager, at the Decatur store, is so rude and unprefesionel. Kay lost a lot of family business because of her. She was so awful she was reported to cooperate. Sandy. Customer service is a must in retail.

name: Maurice Blumberg
text: Go to a Dana Augustine one day show, bring your stones and see what they can do in the day.

name: Jason Terry
text: Great people

name: John Zink
text: The store closed.   Weeks ago 😐

name: Mr Review
text: Employees are horrible they treated me like my service wasn’t important

name: April L. Butler
text: The team at the Kay Jewelers in Brookwood Mall were a wonderful help and so patient while designing an upgraded ring for me.  Excellent service and seemingly unlimited options for even the pickiest bride.  If we ever upgrade again, this is where I'll go, hands down!

name: Dawn Productions
text: I had a great experience there today 12/11/19 as usual. I don’t know why I even attempted to go to any other Kay’s because they don’t have anything and they will basically harass you to buy something. However, I’ve never had that experience at Brookwood. The ladies are always helpful, nice, and they don’t harass you (which is a plus, because If I feel like you’re pressuring me I will walk out and not purchase anything.) Brookwood always have a great selection of jewelry and great customer service. And I am one of those people who “wants to buy something but don’t know what” aka “the complicated, undecided shopper”. Today a young girl name Chariot helped me trade my old ring and pick a new one I wanted to give my mom for Christmas.  She was guided by the of the mangers, I didn’t get her name. But she was a cute middle age black woman. They suggested things to help me make a decision and I purchased my moms gift and actually felt good about it. (Unlike when I purchase something at other Kay’s and end up returning it LOL). Thanks for helping me today and keep up the good work. Soon you guys soon !!!

name: Jackie Carter
text: My fiancé and I loved our experience here! Great staff who were knowledgeable and helped us find the perfect ring! We will be going back!

text: i alway buy from Alexis at Kay Brookwood mall! She is the best and takes the time to meet my needs or let me know what I need. She is like my personal agent, Thats how she makes everyone feel and its rare and special. If you have a need. Go there, every time.

name: Matthew Leonardi
text: By far the best customer service I have ever received, my fiance and I went to pick out our wedding bands and was warmly greater by Ms. Blevins. She was extremely nice, extremely patient, and made sure we got exactly what we wanted at a great deal. She was extremely kind so much that we offered to take her to dinner for her amazing help. Such an incredible professional atmosphere. The rest of the staff was friendly to. I highly suggest going there and asking to speak to Ms.Blevins for she will make you feel right home. They were so friendly that we stay after our purchase for about a half hour just to have conversation. IF YOU WANT PROFESSIONAL AND KIND HELP LOOK NO MORE, MS.BLEVINS IS WHO YOUR LOOKING FOR.

text: I was very disappointed in the service I received from the Kay’s associates. I was there a little while ago to pick out a promise ring my boyfriend was going to purchase for me. When I entered the store I was not greeted what so ever. I stood in that store for over 15 minutes and no one had said a word to me. I can understand being busy with other customers or not realizing someone had walked in but 2 separate employees had walked past me and didn’t even acknowledge my presence. By the time an associate did assist me I was very bothered but they didn’t seem to want to assist someone that was “just looking”. The person seemed highly irritated once I told him I was just looking for a promise ring my boyfriend is buying for me. 10/10 do not recommend this store and will only be shopping at Zales or Jared’s form now on.

text: The manager, Christie, is one of the most nicest and most professional people that you will ever meet. My wife lost and earning and I was trying to replace it. Christie went above and beyond!!! She called I am not sure where to see if they still had this type of earring and of course after 10 years from the original purchase they did not. She then called the people that make the jewelry to see if they could make the pair for me again. They could but it was at a much higher price than the original purchase. I didn’t go that route. I came back today months after talking with her about some other pieces and she helped me again. I am not sure about the other comments about the manager are all about but Christie is the reason I will continue to shop at this store. She deserves a raise and some kind of recognition for what she does everyday. I literally could have walked out and gone to one of the many other jewelers stores in the mall and probably gotten something very similar but because of her I did not. Thank you for the great customer experience.

text: I have been a Kays customer for at least 15 years. The service is normally good but that has changed with the store manager now. She is very condescending and not sympathetic to customer issues. When you have defective jewelry that you're selling as high quality, that's a problem. If I bring something back to you once because of a defect, you would think you would make sure that never happens again. So if I have to bring it back a 2nd then 3rd time, now you're wasting not only my money but my time. For the first time in over 15 years I did not feel like a valued customer at all. I will never spend another penny in this Kay's again.

text: I purchased a  Mother's Day present today at Kay Jewelers, and I had a pleasant and productive shopping experience.  Peggy was friendly and helpful.  Thank you!

name: Hannah Tell
text:
Go anywhere but here. Kays in general has some unethical sales practices. They WILL lie to you.

Returning the engagement ring we bought today because they told my anxiously excited BF the ring he picked was in my size (5) only to tell him after paying it was a 6 (another associate told me no ring in the store has EVER been in a 5) She just lied because she knew how badly he wanted to give me a ring now.

I plan to bring it back and tell her another kay store has it in my size just so I can hear her tell me "we never carry 5's" after that bold face lie she told my BF.

F*** Kays....they also told me id get an additional 10% off for getting a credit card, so I did even though we wanted to pay cash, only to be told right after getting approved the discount couldn't be applied. Now I'm stuck with their credit card. Seriously, just go ANYWHERE but kays. I have friends who have worked there and this is STANDARD.

name: Ashely Harrell
text: I truly want to give the ladies at the Kay Jewelers in the Riverchase Galleria Mall the biggest compliment I can. April and Christie went above and beyond with their customer service to help me with my issue and ensure all my needs were met. I had to get my wedding ring cleaned and repaired as a diamond had fell out. I sent the pieces of jewelry off mid-March and was expecting them back around early-April. My jewelry ticket consisted of one diamond in my band to be replaced, the three separate pieces sautered together, and the final ring cleaned. Upon mid-April, I did not hear from the store on the status of my ring so my husband and I went to the store in person to get an update. Ms. April informed me that the ring was being held because they wanted to make sure that I was okay with how the ring would potentially come out and discuss any pitfalls. I was informed there would be a potential gap in the ring once the pieces were sautered together. Upon me giving the okay, the ring was supposedly sent to be fixed and I continued to wait patiently. During that time, Ms. April helped me find two other LeVian rings that were on sale and that were absolutely gorgeous and suitable to wear at my job. I decided that once my other rings came back, I would get the two new rings resized for my finger. Coming into the first week of May, I discovered my ring was still not back and at this point I was getting very flustered. Ms. Christie spoke with me and ensured that she would get my ring repaired and back to me quickly and had apologized for the long wait. She personally made sure to let the jeweler know to expedite the process. When my ring finally did arrive back, the middle stone of the main ring was still cloudy, there was black residue on the ring bands, the ring was resized even smaller than my finger, and the same diamond was missing when it was presented to me. At this point I was livid, upset, and refused to do any more business with Kay Jewelers. Despite my ordeal, Ms. April and Ms. Christie showed me the greatest empathy for my situation. I was given a comforting and sorrowful hug from Ms. April. Ms. Christie personally took my ring to the jeweler and stayed with it until it was complete so that I would have the ring that same day and not have to wait any longer then I already had. In addition, she ensured that the other two rings that I recently purchased was resized that say day and back on my hand. These ladies truly exemplify the highest standard for customer service. My frustration and anger was not toward these two ladies but toward the poor service I received from the people repairing my ring. Now I do not take my ring off. Each ring or necklace I get from Kay’s is not just a piece of jewelry, but it is a story of my life. With these ladies understanding that, they will continue to earn my business from here on out.

text: My fiancé proposed to me with a beautiful ring from this location Kay's. They told him that he earned $1300 dollars of rewards for his purchase that he could use towards our bands before they expire in a few months. When we returned to look at bands, the sales associate proceeded to tell us that it isn't a $1300 worth of rewards, it's 1300 rewards points. She also told us you have to spend an outrageous amount to even redeem any of your "$1300" reward points. That same day I had my ring and band sent off to be resized. The sales lady told me that they would be ready on the twentieth, which was nearly two weeks. I showed up today to pick up my rings, and a very rude pretentious older sales man informed me that neither of my rings were ready to pick up and that I would have to come back another time. I was pretty pissed to say the least. And I am still waiting for a call about picking up my rings. I would not recommend this store at all.

name: Jason
text: The Zales in Foley Alabama has employees that will mislead you. The told my wife a size 7 ring with wrap around stones could be sized to a 5. Then stated it would be a 3 to 4 week wait to get it sized, then recommended another jeweler to size it in 24 hours. We bought the ring ( over $1000) and went to the other jeweler who said there was no way he could sized it and they knew. When we took it back ( 1 hour later) they started acting like they could only refund $200, they did end up refunding the whole amount. This sale was a blatant lie from the beginning.  An attempt to make a sale at all costs and not refund your money. Full of lies.

name: Kathrine Steinbach
text:
I’ve always heard bad things about signet owned jewelry stores and big brand jewelry stores but I never experienced it first hand until I visited this store.

I received a lovely white sapphire ring as a gift which was purchased online. About a month after receiving the ring, it became apparent to me that the main stone was loose (it was not only wiggly and I could feel it, but it was actually rattling audibly). From being loose there was dust/dirt trapped between the stone and the basket of the stone. Keep in mind I had not been wearing it daily so it was surprising it came loose after such a short period of time.

I brought the ring to the foley Zales to have the sterling silver prongs tightened and the basket cleaned. The rep there said since it wasn’t purchased with warranty I had to pay out of pocket for both the cleaning and repair. It would cost $90.00. (Almost as much as the gift itself, but I couldn’t do anything about the fact it hadnt been purchased without a warranty and I wasn’t going to call up the person who gave it to because that would be rude).

When I picked up the ring I was ready to pay for services done, except the moment my hands touched it I knew it was still loose. I showed the representatives behind the counter and they swore up and down to me that it wasn’t loose and it was my imagination. They wiggled it and one even got her pen ink on it trying to “disprove” me.

They said they could send it back free of charge so I said ok. But I got a bad feeling and since it had become a sentimental gift I felt like I no longer trusted that store to handle it since I felt like they were lying to me about it not being loose. I asked them for it back and they said yes but they would have to charge me the $90.00. I didn’t want to have a confrontation with them so I paid and figured maybe I should just get a second opinion because it very well could be my imagination.

She swipes my card and is packing it up and I said “I hear it rattling, tell me you can’t hear that! Call me crazy, It can’t be my imagination!”

She held it up to her ear and to my surprise said “yes! I do hear it rattling. You’re not crazy”.

Im dumbfounded!! Before I paid, she said it wasn’t loose, lied to my face, then the moment I swiped my card, she acknowledged it was loose!!! I am appalled. I’m just going to dispute the transaction with my bank now because there is no way I trust the people working there. And I’m going to advise the person who purchased it for me to do the same. I won’t be making any purchases from jewelry stores like this again. I learned the hard way, at least this time it was only $90 instead of $900

text: The engagement ring that I had now had for five years kept loosing diamonds every couple of months.  I was so frustrated with this happening. Luckily, every time I went into Kay’s to get it sent off I dealt with the same sweet girl, Elizabeth.  Elizabeth was always very understanding and apologetic.  After about the fourth time of loosing a diamond Elizabeth told me she would talk to her manager to see if they could get me a new ring or just pick out a completely different one.  I sent it off that time and believe it or not, four months later a diamond was missing again. I went back up to Kay’s and luckily Elizabeth was there and I didn’t even have to explain to her what happened, she remembered every detail we had talked about.  I ended up picking out a simple solitaire ring. I hated having to change the ring design but luckily because of Elizabeth’s AMAZING customer service and patience the process was a breeze! Every Kay store needs an Elizabeth in their store!

name: Cara Rigby
text:
HORRIBLE MANAGER NAMED MICHELLE!!!

Worst Customer service ive ever experienced anywhere! Went to Kays about a week & a half ago to look and purchase an engagement ring with my fiance. Starting looking at rings in our budget and was only shown 1 ring which I loved (& the girl who showed us the ring got kinda in trouble for showing it to us) until they said they were having a diamond show & started showing me rings from those cases, apparently they only have a diamond show every so often and I was shown about 3 rings or so from those cases & ended up picking one of the 3 after being felt like those were the only ones in our budget and  I was pressured into it. We were able to get the ring sized that day & take it home.

Skip to week or so later, I decided to just browse online at rings that were in our budget & that said available in store at my local store. Came across several beautiful rings that I was NEVER shown to begin with so I decided to call and speak with the manager who helped us & told her about how I had seen a few online that said they were available in store & in our budget, so I go to the store to see them in person to make sure I didn't pick the wrong ring.
Got there & the manager who from the first visit was super helpful and nice, didn't speak to me once when I entered the store. I showed the girl who was helping me a few rings I seen online that said they were in store & the first ring she said " oh we just sold that ring" the 2nd and 3rd ring I showed her she Said " I don't think we have it" & I was like "why would it say it was in store if It wasnt?" She couldn't give me an answer. She did everything in her power to convince me to keep the ring I had but that pissed me off even more so I still ended up returning the ring which I know they aren't happy about, but I wasn't happy with being pretty much only shown options that benefited them. They didn't treat me the same as the first experience & u just don't do your customers that way. Regardless. I will do everything to make sure everyone is aware of how crooked this place is.

Also, after returning the ring (which was leased throigh progressive) we made an account online to see how the process of the refund was going, come to find out our total was double the price we were told it would be in store from the kay employees. The deposit we put down was suppose to be 79 dollars and would also be the amount of our monthy payment & after looking online we discovered they charged us 86 dollars for the deposit & that our payments would be 91.60 WEEKLY! We were told 79 dollars and some change monthly and then it shot up to 91.60 weekly! They never went over the contract or interest rate with us.

After the return I asked the employee if everything on their end was done and all we were waiting on was the leasing company to do their part. Called the leasing company to find out that they were waiting on KAYS to send the invoice over to get the refund process done & taken care of.

Called Kays once again to speak with the unprofessional, rude heifer off a "Manager" to make sure they sent the invoice in and to try to get some answers as to why she never vocally disclosed with us while signing the lease that our total was actually double the price she told us, & she would not answer the question. All she would say was "you made the return, what else do you need, blah blah.." How they can get away with is beyond me, after asking her multiple times times she actually HUNG UP on us. I called bk & another girl asnwer the phone, I continued to try to get answers we as customers deserved & as I was speaking the girl started pressing buttons on the phone & then hung up on me, incredibly immature & unprofessional. I am mind blown at my experience. I made a complaint with corporate, with the better business Bureau and got intouch with the district manager with the help of another kays manager of a different location!
KAYS IS A FREAKING JOKE, THEY LIE & NEVER FULLY DISCLOSE THE FULL TRUTH & PRICE TO THEIR CUSTOMERS IN ORDER TO MAKE THEIR SALES & COMMISSION!

text: Absolutely loved our experience getting our wedding rings/bands. I was able to build my ring exactly the way I wanted with the help of creative jewelers experts! We Will forever be grateful to them! If you are in the market for some jewelry they are phenomenal!

name: scott thackerson
text: Bill, Brandi and their staff are very professional. The technology they have to create your custom jewelry is amazing. I highly recommend them!

name: Lloyd Grimes Jr
text: I was needing a ring sized soI went knowing nothing about this place. Thought to myself,"this place looks pretty nice", so I go in. I was told that it would take a week to a week and a half. It's been two weeks now so I call to see if the ring was in, and was told that I was basically lied to by one of the employees. Because the"owner" says they never get jewelry that fast.    I have nothing to say about the sizing yet, I'll let you know whenever I get the ring back.

name: Sandra Stone
text: Went for info on estate jewelry. Staff was friendly and knowledgeable. Jewelry is unique and reasonably-priced.  I am going back for Christmas gifts.

name: Robbie Landis
text: Billy and his staff coul not be more helpful. They are very personable but also went above and beyond the call of duty to make the item I needed. There is also a very cool cat on the premises. Always my go to jeweler !

resp.text: Thanks for the review, Robbie! It was our pleasure!

name: S & C
text: Creative jewelers worked with my husband and I Q custom create my engagement ring. Beautiful piece of jewelry, we could not be happier! The staff and owners at creative jewelers are kind, honest, and great to work with. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words, we are always happy to help!

name: Maggie Freeman
text: I have loved every interaction I have had with Creative Jewelers. As a Miss UNA contestant, I had the ability to design a UNA themed ring-the ability to design a ring allows for so much personality to come through. I recently was able to create a mother’s ring for my mom’s birthday. The Creative Jewelers team worked with me to create a six stone ring. This store has the friendliest environment and the best staff! I look forward to working with Creative Jewelers for all my future jewelry needs!

resp.text: Thanks Maggie for the great review, hope to see you again soon!

name: Erin Gray
text: Stopped in to have my wedding rings cleaned and Taylor was so helpful! He showed me that I had a few diamonds that were loose in my engagement ring. We sent it off to be fixed and they did just that! He was very helpful! I would recommend Taylor at Creative to anyone! He’s the best in the business!

resp.text: Thank you for the wonderful review!

name: Tonitia Butler
text: I had a piece engraved with my late husband's handwriting. They got it exactly right and it was completed quickly. Everyone working there was extremely friendly and helpful.

name: Donna Freeze
text: Creative Jewelers were able to help me find the perfect replacement posts for a pair of earrings that are sentimental to me. I appreciate the willingness to help and the professionalism shown to get the job done.

name: Susan Beckett
text: Billy, Brandi and the staff at Creative Jewelers could not be more professional and helpful.  They repaired and appraised a family pice for me and it looks wonderful. In addition, they have some really special gift options in the store so I was able to pick out a great birthday present for my sister!

name: Alvin Apger
text:
Everyone that I saw, was very pleasant. Billy, the gemologist, spent almost 2 hours with me, discussing the process of taking raw stones, having a lapidary cut them into the desired shape, and choosing the metal for the pieces of jewelry. It was all very fascinating and never did I feel rushed to make a decision. Now I’m even more excited to see the final items! Will definitely return!
Thank you so much!
Christine

resp.text: Thank you Christine for the kind words! It was a pleasure, and we are excited to see the final results!

name: James P
text: Walked in the door seemed everyone was to busy to speak, walk to the counter stood there forever without  a "Hi we'll be right with you" on my long walk out still no noise from anyone was heard. The folks just around the corner are the ones who gained a very good customer. Sorry guys

resp.text:
James, we are sorry that you feel your experience was enough to merit giving us a one star review on this platform. We thrive on giving every customer a great experience when they're in our store, so we hate to hear you didn't get the same experience. When you called before you arrived, you mentioned you had questions about your rings, and we asked you to bring them by.  You said that was fine, and that it was nice outside for a good walk. When you came in, both of us were already with customers working on custom designs, so we weren't able to break away to help you right then, and we were the only employees in the store today. When you walked over to look at our men's ring display, I acknowledged you but I don't think you noticed, which is fine, it was a little loud in the store at the time. We hate that you weren't able to stick around for a few more minutes, because we would have loved to help you.

We hope that you did find the help you were looking for, because we know that is what's most important. We truly appreciate your feedback, and we hope you have a wonderful day!

name: James Havranek
text: Very friendly, professional, and courteous staff, who went out of their way to make me feel welcome and create my pieces. I received my jewelry, today, and am very pleased. They have purchased another piece with me in mind. I'll continue to use their services. And, many thanks.

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words, James! We look forward to seeing you again!

name: Cynthia Hibbett
text: Great experience!  They take care of their customers

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words!

name: Mary Ann Powell
text: I recently needed to have the watchband on my Citizen Solar powered watch repaired and was referred to CREATIVE JEWELERS (in downtown Florence, Al) by a friend.  The salesperson, Taylor Schweighardt, was extremely nice and told me they generally did not do watch repair, however he asked me what I needed. I explained that the clasp kept opening while on my wrist and I was unable to wear it for fear of losing it. Since the repair was not on the watch itself but only on the band he attempted to repair it right then but was unsuccessful. However, he offered to call Citizen and find out if he could get a replacement band (witch he didn't have to do). He called me the next day and said that Citizen had discontinued that specific band and they had nothing comparable. Since that was the case, I told him he might as well just dispose of the watch since there was nothing else that could be done. I thanked him for going out of his way to do everything he could to salvage my watch. At home I got on line and considered purchasing a new watch but changed my mind since I had another less expensive watch I could wear as a replacement until I could purchase something better. Two days passed and Taylor had called and left me a message to call him.  When I did he had good news.  He and the owner of the shop (Billy) had put their heads together and figured out how to repair the band. I was so surprised, I was speechless!  I went to get it the next day and asked  how much I owed them and they said no charge.  I insisted on paying them but they said no, but any referrals would certainly be appreciated.  They specialize in stunning hand created top of the line diamond and gem jewelry, and I might add, thoughtful, top of the line service as well!!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words, it was our pleasure to be able to assist you!

name: Calhoun2
text:
The staff here is great! I carried in a ring that I'd bought elsewhere and they gladly sized it for me. They were very affordable too. I initially dealt with Taylor when I called for information about sizing. He was extremely knowledgeable and took the time to discuss options with me. Both the day I dropped off the ring and the day I picked it up, I dealt with Billy, the owner. Super nice guys, couldn't ask for friendlier, more knowledgeable Jewelers.
(The store's mascot, Bernadette, is icing on the cake!)
They have beautifully crafted, custom jewelry. Some pieces are truly breathtaking.
Stop in and look around or just go in for the friendly conversation. I highly recommend Creative Jewelers.

resp.text: Thanks for the lovely review, Christy! Stop by any time, we look forward to doing business with you again!

name: Mrs Gray
text: Very nice people.  Beautiful jewelry.

name: Don Mcbrayer
text: They fixed my wedding ring which is 52 years old and now it looks brand new. They have a very friendly atmosphere which is due in part to a very friendly owner and his staff. I will definitely use them again in the future.

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words, Don!

name: Mike Kimbrell
text: My experience at Creative Jewelers was outstanding,  the staff was so helpful and personable with all of my needs. I highly recommend Creative Jewelers for everyone looking for a professional and one on one Jewelry experience.

resp.text: Thank you Mike, it was our pleasure serving you!

name: Jackie Darby
text: Friendly people that make you feel welcome and always do great work!

resp.text: Thank you for the review!

name: melissa behel
text: Creative Jewelers was able to repair and clean my jewelry within 24 hrs, they were courteous, kind, and very reasonable.  They stand behind their work.  I will be using them for my jewelry purchases from now on.  Thanks Billy

resp.text: Thank you Melissa! It's always a pleasure to work with you!

name: Clyde Beaver
text: When I moved from Atlanta a few years ago, I was lucky to find Creative Jewelers. Before that, I thought I'd at least have to go to Huntsville for real quality. And I really had no idea of what real custom design was until they showed me their crazy software that can do just about anything. Love the environment. Quality service and selection – informative, but not pushy. Give them a look. Also, being in historic downtown, lots of other stuff to do after shopping!

name: Michele Broadfoot
text: Billy has created two custom pieces for me. Both were beautiful and beyond expectations!!  And they were finished sooner than requested!I wouldn’t use anyone else!  Highly recommended!

name: Robin Young
text: I had been given my grandmother’s engagement ring  over 40 years ago after she passed away. It was given to her when she became engaged to marry in 1933. I wore it many years myself as a birthstone ring. Several years ago a diamond was lost from the setting. I took it to Creative Jewelrrs to have the stone replaced and to make any needed repairs to make the ring wearable again. The ring looks great! I am so proud to be able to wear it again. Great job!

resp.text: Thank you for choosing us Robin, we were happy to do it! Let us know if we can help with anything else!

name: J.R. Lewis
text: The staff members are pleasant and very knowledgeable. Prices for repairs I’ve gotten are quite reasonable always. I continue to use Creative Jewelers because I have great customer service experiences, the people are good to me, and they have a wonderful selection of high-quality jewelry.

resp.text: Thank you for the review J.R.! We are always glad to serve our customers with whatever they need!

name: Joe Tanner
text: I had a wonderful experience buying a diamond to go into my grandmother’s 1953 engagement ring. The staff was incredibly knowledgeable and kind. I will be purchasing all my jewelry here from now on.

name: Larry Terrell
text: Billy Hammock and the Creative Jewelers team we’re extremely helpful and informative with my recent purchase. I really appreciate their friendly, no-pressure atmosphere, and their attention to detail.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words, we truly appreciate it!

name: James Thigpen
text: Always courteous, kind and professional, all the staff at Creative Jewelers have taken a keen interest in what my wife and I are looking for when we come in. When I heard Billy and his team were the only ones in town that could truly create a piece of jewelry from your own design, I had to see it for myself. While we haven't bought that piece yet, I can say that it was a fun, pleasant experience, and Billy's professionalism spotted with his downright friendliness and sense of humor only added to our overall experience.

name: Wanda Glover
text: Billy and his salesman are so friendly and helpful. Highly recommend

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words, Wanda!

name: Jerry Williamson
text: You can't find a better jeweler than Billy Hammock at Creative Jewelers in Florence. I have worked with Billy for about 5 years now and send all of my clients to him when they are looking for a top notch jeweler that knows his diamonds. You'll always get the best service and the highest quality jewelry when you shop here.

name: Victoria Fisher
text: As I was wondering what I would get for my niece for Valentine's day, I remembered my recent purchase for myself at Creative Jewelers and how nice and accommodating Billy and Brandi were. So, I picked up the phone and gave Brandi my budget and the age of my niece and told her to pick something wonderful out and gift wrap it! She did just that and my niece was THRILLED! Thank you again Creative Jewelers for another great shopping experience!!

name: Sheila Pierce
text:
While Creative Jeweler does sell beautiful pieces of jewelery, I especially appreciate the fact that they have an in house jeweler.
It’s good to know that my piece of jewelry was repaired right there in the store.
Thank you, Brandi and Billy!
Sheila Pierce

resp.text: Thank you, Sheila! We appreciate your business!

name: Bart Davis
text: Great place to get a custom ring done..shes gonna love it if I ever find her!

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words!

name: Jason Fuller
text: I haven't gotten to make a purchase from the store yet, but I had a good experience when I went in. I had heard about their ability to go above what a normal jeweler could do creatively and I stopped by to get some ideas for my wife. The staff was courteous and Billy and I had a great conversation about great remodel they had done to the building. This seems like a great place.

name: K Eubanks
text: I went  to creative jewelers with a very sentimental and unique idea.  They were  very encouraging and helpful, even though I thought my idea may be impossible. When I went to pick it up today I was so overwhelmed with appreciation. They  went way above and beyond to make my little dream a reality, and it turned out absolutely perfectly. Thank you CJ!!

resp.text: Thank you Katie. We love being a small part of special moments in life!

name: Kelly King
text: Had a great experience at Creative Jewelers.  The staff is very knowledgeable and friendly plus they have some absolutely beautiful jewelry to choose from, great selection.  I will definitely be coming back!

name: Sydney Burch
text: They did a very good job with helping me create a beautiful necklace! I will definitely be coming back!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words, we look forward to creating your next project!

name: Richard Topete
text: Awesome people, with a lot of knowledge!!

name: Timothy Butler
text: Billy and his team are great at what they do!! Really enjoyed working with them on my jewelry needs

resp.text: Thanks, we always appreciate your business!

name: Linda Bissonnette
text: I have used this jewelry company several times and I'm always pleased with the results..Everyone is very nice and a pleasure to talk to..

resp.text: Thank you for your review, it's always a pleasure doing business with you!

name: Taylor Schweighardt
text: They offer a ton of different products, from low end to high end and designer lines. Staff was awesome!!! Didn't pressure me into buying anything and gave me my space to shop (which is a pet peeve of mine lol) but were still available to answer questions and show me rings. 5 stars isn't enough!

name: Randy Pettus
text: Wonderful staff and went above the norm to help me.

resp.text: Thank you, we're always happy to help!

name: MACON JONES
text: Followed design format perfectly, on time and price quoted. Good job folks!

name: Tim Case
text: Billy and his staff are great.

name: Teresa Little Brewer
text: Very friendly and helpful staff.

resp.text: Thanks Teresa! We are honored!

name: Mark Forsythe
text: I'm very pleased with the staff at creative jewlers they don't mind to take the time needed to find what you need you just don't find that any Moore like you could in the old days I am truly grateful for the in there business I tell my wife it's the only place I want to shop !! I would tell anyone to shop there great prices as well

name: Julie Ryan
text: Does this store buy vintage jewelry?

resp.text: We typically do not, but if you have something like an estate piece, you're more than welcome to bring it by and we can take a look at it!

name: Red Tree Realty
text: Great folks and great jewelry.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Shelia Blackstock
text: Everyone is nice and very helpful !!!!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words!

name: angie roberts
text: Wonderful service, friendly people, highly recommend

resp.text: Thank you, Angie. We appreciate your business!

name: Marg Webb
text: Great help with designing a new ring

name: Anne Bernauer
text: Awesome service and staff!!! Thank you!!!

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words, Anne!

name: Leigh Carrell
text: Excellent work and prices.

name: Vanessa
text: Hands down best service in town. Angela and Madi were very helpful and the quality and prices were outstanding. Don't buy your jewelry anywhere else!

resp.text: We truly appreciate the support Vanessa! Thank you for the wonderful review!

name: JandA Whitmer
text: Took my great grandmother's ring in because it had a crack in part of the band. I wanted to be able to wear it and they fixed it so beautifully. My wedding ring also received the royal treatment and looks just like the day my husband gave it to me. You won't regret choosing Goldstein's for your jeweler!

resp.text: Thank you for the Great review!

name: Jeannie Churchwell
text: Friendly and wonderful service. Andrew was helpful, kind, and knowledgeable. It was a wonderful experience thanks to Andrew's help. I will recommend Andrew and your staff to others. The ring is beautiful and me and my husband love it.

resp.text: Thank you for the Great review!!

name: Kirk Becker
text: I've only used Goldstein's twice and I must say I'm super impressed! Very professional, courteous, and knowledgeable jewelers. Don was a great help with my recent jewelry purchase, finding exactly what I wanted and needed with my budget in mind and didn't try to oversell or belittle my purchase. This is the exact kind of customer service people long for nowadays but rarely find. Keep up the excellent work Goldstein's, you've got a customer for a long time with me! Thanks.

resp.text: Thanks so much, Kirk!  It was our pleasure.

name: Robby Smith
text: Helpful, energetic staff. Easy to work with. Large offering with great quality.

resp.text: Thank you for the Great review!

name: Mae Naylor
text: See Don and Angela, they are 100% lovely and professional. I have been going to Goldstein's for 18 years. I have bought amazing pieces and have had a number of repairs and re-plating (rhodium on white gold) done as well as one memorable occasion when I had a ring absolutely stuck on my finger. I have ALWAYS HAD a great experience and HIGHLY RECOMMEND Goldstein's for any jewelry questions or needs you may have. Five stars

resp.text: Thanks Mae for the great review!

name: Melanie Craft
text: Goldstein’s is the only jeweler I trust! They make me feel so comfortable every time I come in. They can repair your precious items in-house since there is a master craftsman on site, so you never risk losing something by having it sent off. I will never use anyone else.

resp.text: Thank you Mrs. Craft for your wonderful review. We hope you are enjoying your beautiful necklace!

name: Lisa Beasley
text: I wouldn't shop anywhere else for jewelry, watches, and heartfelt gifts.  Everyone there is knowledgeable, friendly, and very helpful.  Mr. Frank has a wonderful group of people working for Goldstein's Jewelers.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the wonderful review Mrs. Beasley. Have a great weekend!!

name: David Barquist
text: They were beyond helpful and friendly. Helped me search and find exactly what I was looking for. Great wrapping and beautiful packaging. 10/10 stars, I'll definitely be getting all my future jewelry from here from now on!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review!

name: Kendall
text: Excellent experience with everyone! Thank you especially to Andrew for helping me design several beautiful pieces of custom jewelry!

resp.text: Thank you for the Great review!!

name: Mary Clare Lovorn
text: Outstanding service today. Angela (#2) made an excellent suggestion for a gift I was looking for. She even asked if I would like one for myself and I said YES!  Grateful and appreciative of the time she spent with me. Merry Christmas and 2021 Blessings to the entire Goldstein's staff!

resp.text: Thank you, Mary Clare.  I heard Angela talking about how much she enjoyed helping you.  Merry Christmas!

name: Jeanette Nowadnick
text: Extremely professional and wonderful customer service.  My jewelry was ready ahead of quoted time frame and the price was reasonable. My ring hasn’t sparkled and shined this bright in years!  I would absolutely recommend this jeweler and will be a customer for life.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review!!

name: Brandon Bradley
text: Would 100% recommend to anyone in the market. My man Andrew was super helpful. Will be back, I am sure of it.

resp.text: Hi Will. Thank you for the great review! Andrew

name: Jennifer Turner
text: Ms. Underdown and the staff were so helpful. Goldstein’s took family rings and made wedding bands for my nephews, beautiful rings. There were some diamonds left from one of the two rings used(one my mother’s engagement ring and the other a chandelier ring that belong to my aunt). Ms. Underdown helped me design a ring for myself with the remaining stones from my aunts ring. The result is a beautiful band with the diamonds and  aquamarines which were my aunts birthstone. I cannot thank you enough for the care and concern that was shown in the remaking of these family rings. Jen Turner

resp.text: We're so happy that you are so happy Jennifer - thank you for sharing!

name: Jecko Ecko
text: Don and his co-workers were very polite and helpful with assisting me with what I needed and they were able to take care of my necklace in a timely manner.

resp.text: Thank you for the stars!

name: Lori Whittle
text: I always receive excellent service every time i walk into Goldstein’s. The staff is very friendly and knowledgeable. They are extremely helpful. Their jewelry is the best in Mobile. If you are looking for good quality, or just something special, I highly recommend Goldstein’s Jewelers.

resp.text: Lori, thank you so much for your review and your recommendation!

name: Tommy Preslar
text: Great service that feels like they care for you the customer and the products they sell. It’s like going home and sitting down with family!

resp.text: Thank you Tommy!  We're glad you're in our family!

name: David Ferebee
text:
Too bad they don’t appreciate long time customers! My wife went in there days before Christmas and asked to have her  charm bracelet cleaned and a new battery for my watch. The watch, bracelet and ALL the charms over the years (20+)were purchased from this store.
She was told “we have not sold those items in years and would not be able to help her today”.
Maybe leadership has changed here from the beginning and relationships do not matter anymore.
I am not bitter, but disappointed that after my many years of buying my wife jewelry from the store it is over.
I am sure I can find another jewelry store in town as I still have many years left to buy for my wife.

resp.text:
David, I'm sorry your wife felt mistreated.  We did have a store full of customers when she was in during the week of Christmas.  We just cannot take someone away from a customer to clean jewelry or change a battery so we do it when we're closed.  As to the Pandora, we no longer have the equipment to properly clean it.  We have not carried Pandora for over three years.

We work very hard to do the best we can, and we're proud of the reviews we receive.  I am sorry you feel we dropped the ball this time.  I do appreciate your review and we will try to be better explaining ourselves in the future.  Richard Frank, Owner

name: Alissa Doll
text: The staff at Goldstein’s is welcoming and very accommodating to a wide array of jewelry needs! The service is fantastic quality and efficient! I had my engagement ring cleaned and it looked like it did the day I got it! I highly recommend Goldstein’s!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words, Alissa.  And thanks for coming to Goldstein's!

name: Lydia Dillard
text: I was Amazed to have made 1 phone call and they immediately guided me to their location. I was in a panic because my husband's wedding ring didn't fit. Being just married hours prior, It was imperative that I get him not just any ring but a nice one on our Wedding day. Well they welcomed us as if we were long time established customers. Ms Angela assisted us and showed him the perfect ring. Her and Andrew were so helpful during my time of panicking..... The service was excellent, The price was extremely affordable. We left as Happy Newlyweds thanks to Golstein's and their caring associates.

resp.text: Thank you Lydia and congratulations again!

name: Danielle Isen
text: My engagement ring was in need of significant repair.   The band had literally snapped in half and set was damaged.   The jeweler transformed the ring.   It looks brand new and was done very efficiently.   The quality of repair was exceptional,  and the employees in the store are friendly.   I highly recommend Goldstein's Jewelers!

resp.text: Thank you for trusting us with your meaningful jewelry.  I'm glad we could take care of this for you!  And thank you for the very nice review.  Happy New Year!  Richard

name: Gavin Grove
text: Beautiful pearls, exactly what I was looking for. Don was very knowledgeable and accommodating, no pressure, a pleasant shopping experience.

resp.text: Thanks so much, Gavin.  It was my pleasure.

name: Scott McIlrath
text: I found a silver spoon marked J Goldstein and couldn’t find much on the internet. But I did find Goldstein’s Jewelry in Mobile. I emailed the store and Angela responded. After a few texts, Angela identified what I had found and provided some history. Service above and beyond!!! They have been around a long time. Service like this guarantees they will be around much longer!!! Thank you Angela!

resp.text: Thank you - I'm glad I could help!

name: Jessica
text: Going into a jewelry store can be intimidating and a little scary sometimes especially when you love the sparkle and shine. You don’t know how much items cost or if the people will be nice to you. From the minute you walk into Goldstein’s, they treat you like family. Whether you are just looking, buy a gift, convince someone to say yes or just want to treat yourself,  the team is there for to help you decide and maintain your purchase. Thank you Goldstein’s for being the best!!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Jessica.  We really appreciate your kind words!  Richard

name: Ty Edwards
text: I had a few diamonds missing in my mom’s ring and had been scared to be without it. Goldstein’s came highly recommended. I just picked up my ring and I’m truly amazed at how it looks. I highly recommend ! Great work and customer service!

resp.text: Thank you Ty!  We know how important & sentimental jewelry can be.  We're happy you are so happy with our work!

name: Joe Gibson
text: 10 out 10! Always treated with A+ customer service! Would recommend to anyone!

resp.text: Thank you Joe!

name: Tierney Vial
text: Goldstein's Jewelers is the best jewelry store in Mobile and along the Gulf Coast where you can find a beautiful selection of jewelry for every occasion. The staff is genuinely friendly and helpful with their knowledge and expertise in fine jewelry. Over seventy years and five generations my family has had the pleasure of shopping at Goldstein's Jewelers making many of our family's milestones special. This local family owned business is like family to me. Thank you Mr. Frank, Angela, Andrew, and everyone at Goldstein's Jewelers.

resp.text: Thank you!!

name: Tamika Hesley
text: Fantastic Atmosphere! Fantastic People! Fantastic Customer Service! Thank you, Don for a great experience! Especially during this 2020 Christmas season!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Tamika!

name: Sian Morris
text: Brought my favorite piece of jewelry in to get a repair the day after it broke. It was very sentimental to me. I believe it was Angela who helped me decide what my best option was for the repair. She was so helpful!!! I got a text a few days later saying it was ready. They did an amazing job. Can hardly see where the damage was and it came back cleaner than ever! Very quick and easy. Will definitely be returning.

resp.text: Thanks Sian!  We're always here to help :)

name: Marissa Hamilton
text: I came into Goldstein’s to get my engagement ring sized today. The manager Angela was so kind and helpful, even though I did not get it sized here today. She was honest with me about recommending I getting it sized at the (non local) jeweler my ring was purchased from, but she still sized my finger and cleaned my ring for free. Because of this awesome customer service, I will certainly come back to Goldstein’s for all my future jewelry needs.

resp.text: Thank you Marissa and congratulations!

name: Kathy Cobb
text: We are from out of State and I needed a gold chain for a Catholic medal that I bought my Daddy 41 years ago. He wore it from that day until the day he died. Sadly, he passed away 3.5 years ago. My Mama gifted me with the medal and we were passing through Mobile and I Googled jewelry stores and Goldstein's came up with rave reviews. Andrew met us at the door and helped us select the perfect chain. It was a wonderful experience and I highly recommend this store.

resp.text: Hi Kathy! Thank you for the great review!

name: Troy Clemmons
text: I went to Goldstein’s after having my rings cut off my finger. I wore them too long during pregnancy and it resulted in them having to be removed. They completely redid and fixed my rings back to brand new! So professional and worth every cent.

resp.text: Thank you for the stars!

name: Faye Cartwright
text: Friendly, courteous service and they had exactly the necklace I wanted for my great granddaughter’s birthday.

resp.text: Thank you Faye!

name: Chris Butler
text: Always a pleasure doing business at Goldstein’s. I got my wife’s engagement ring from them years ago, and just recently purchased a second wedding band from them. They already had the sizing and style, and had the band ready in just 3 short days. It’s going to make a wonderful Mother’s Day gift. They treat you like an actual person with respect and not just a number. I have the utmost trust in them to do a great job every single time. Thank y’all!

resp.text: Thank you, Chris!  You are a pleasure and we appreciate the review!  Richard

name: Ryan Unsworth
text: They were able to get everything taken care of for me very quickly. I would recommend them for any of your jewelry needs!

resp.text: Hi Ryan. Thank you for the great review!

name: Natalie Thornburg
text: My fiancé & I had our first experience with Goldstein's when we were looking at engagement rings over a year ago. We had gone to FIVE other jewelers and had no luck. These people helped us for over an hour and would not give up until we found the perfect ring. Fast forward to three months ago when we went to pick out our wedding bands: once again, great experience. They were so friendly & helpful and made the process a breeze. Last month, I brought them my great-great-great grandmother's ring to be resized. Trusting someone to repair a diamond ring that has made it through 5 generations was difficult, but Goldstein's did an excellent job & were very professional. They even discovered two cracks in the ring, repaired those, and kept me up to date throughout the process as well. This is just a great jewelers with a fantastic staff. I highly recommend them!

name: Emily Suddath
text:
Goldstein’s helped me and fixed my problems when another local jewelry store failed to deliver the customer service I would expect. I cannot explain what sets Goldstein’s apart until I share the negative experience I had at another jewelry store in Mobile, so I will share that first.

Like I said, I had a ring repair somewhere else first. The other jewelry store not only sized my ring down (when I didn’t ask for it to be sized down), but failed to claim fault for it.  My diamond had fallen out of my setting and I asked the other jewelry store to reset the diamond and also solder my wedding band and engagement band together. When I got my rings back from them, my ring was a size 5 3/4 which is 3/4 smaller than the original size, which was a  size 6 (rings also fit tighter when they’re soldered together, so it fit much tighter than before.) I want to also note that their store never sized me in store either, but rather had the ring repaired with no size listed in their system. Goldstein’s makes a practice of sizing you and placing the size in the system, anytime you come in for ring repairs so that it is never your word against theirs.

When I came back to the other store, not only did they not apologize, they did not want to take apart my soldered rings and resize them individually (so as to protect the integrity of them) , but they recommended making the two rings into one. The sales associate also sized me as a size 7 which is A LOT larger than the size 5 3/4 ring they had sent me home with just a few days before!

I felt something was off with how everything was being handled, so I decided to not have my repairs done there but instead have them done somewhere else...which would be how I ended up at Goldstein’s a few days later.

When I went to Goldstein’s, they measured my finger and reassured me that yes, the other store had sized my ring incorrectly. The rings wouldn’t even fit on my finger without redness and swelling (which the other jewelry store associate said was due to having large knuckles, or perhaps even the humid weather.)

Goldstein’s assured me they stood behind their sizing methods. The other jewelry store actually told me they didn’t guarantee their fit and scoffed over the phone when asked if they guaranteed the fit. Goldstein’s on the other hand, said that they do guarantee the fit they size you with in store. They didn’t make me feel like I was being unreasonable at any step of the way, like I felt at the other store. They affirmed me, as one should do when providing quality customer service.

Goldstein’s measured me as a size 6 1/2  and I noticed they had a careful attention to fit, and also that their ring sizing methods seemed more legitimate than what I was offered at the other jewelry store (they used individual rings to size me at Goldstein’s, and the other store used a keychain of sorts full of various sized rings. I was more impressed with the Goldstein’s method because if you’re getting rings soldered together, you want to see how the two stacked rings will fit your finger and that they come off easily, versus what was offered at the other store, with only one ring being placed on the finger to determine fit.)

If I had gone through with the second round of repairs at the other store, I would have been paying for extra gold that I would have had removed anyway because they sized me as a 7, and my true size is a 6 1/2, as determined by Goldstein’s (my rings fit beautifully now!) Goldstein’s got it right the FIRST time versus the other store which didn’t get it right the first two times.

All this to say, Goldstein’s did everything correctly and professionally. They even texted me to see how my rings were fitting a week later. I call that excellent customer service.

If you want a correct fit the first time with no back and forth issues that make you second guess yourself, and if you’d rather have extra money in your pockets (unlike I do, since I had to pay for correct repairs that the other store failed to provide) then please, go to Goldstein’s!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the great review.  We are sorry you had such an awful experience at the other jeweler, but happy we were able to help you.  So glad you are able to wear your beautiful rings again.

name: Georgina Anyidoho
text:
I have never been treated so badly and humiliated like i was at Goldstein's! If only I knew my experience with them later will be so emotionally and mentally traumatizing, I'd have never stepped foot in that store.
I had insisted I'd rather patronize a local business rather than purchase online contrary to what my boyfriend wanted. In the store, I chose a ring that was in the showcase. It wasn't my size so I was told they'd order one in my size, also the diamond for the ring was not kept in the store so i had to wait for over a month for it to come in store. Unfortunately my wedding was called off and so I decided to return the rings for a refund 6 days after purchase was made and three days since receiving it from the store. There is a 15 day return policy for a full refund. I was denied a full refund because as the store owner stated; " Its bad for my business" and offered a 50% refund instead, which i refused. I don't understand why I  should bargain for a refund I'm  entitled  to. When I insisted to be treated fairly and given my refund,the store owner  Richard Frank Jr,  made comments suggesting bias and racism against my color and country of origin.Insinuating I'm ignorant and stupid because I'm a foreigner from another country and had an accent.  I have never been treated like this in any other store environment and urge any other potential customers to beware and steer clear of this rude and racist  business. I find Goldstein's store profession and ethics to be unsatisfactory and many other reviews will state the same. Today I have formally lodged a complaint with the Mobile commerce department and will be taking Goldstein's operator Frank to court.

resp.text: It is unfortunate that we are unable to give a return on special order items.

name: V Bryant
text:
My husband and I have had a relationship with Goldstein’s for more than 37 years.  Prior to that,  my husband and his family had shopped there for more than 40 years.
To me,  Goldstein’s is like an extension of my family.  I am ALWAYS greeted at the door with a smile and they call me by my name.  ( That is an impressive start!) Even though I consider Angela my personal shopper, all the employees are very qualified to offer their services.
I have never been displeased with their service.  The line of products is extensive,  reputable,  and reliable.
Richard is the best “boss man” ever!  He is very soft spoken and polite.  He knows “his stuff!”  Richard can answer any question you might have and find any
product you might desire!
Angela is such a fine and outstanding representative of Goldstein’s.  She always takes the time to ask about me and my family.  She is sincere and genuine.  Angela wants me to be happy!!  And I ALWAYS am very happy and satisfied when I leave.
I cannot day enough about my experiences at Goldstein’s.  I highly recommend them to anyone!!  You WILL NOT BE DISSAPPOINTED!!

resp.text: Thank you, Virginia ;) We love being able to help - that's the most important part of our business!

text:
Having lived in The Mobile area since 1973, I grew up seeing Goldstein's pretty much my entire life. My first recollection was the opulence that was the gilt heavy barred store in Bel Air Mall near the fountain. Through the years I developed an appreciation for really beautiful items.
Not always able to afford, but always with an appreciation, I would stop in to see Richard and his wonderful team.
Fast forward to today, and I now know that affordable is available and BEST PRACTICES in customer care are the norm at my favourite jewelry store in the world.
I love my watches and the gifts that I have purchased from Goldstein's. If you've not been, GO and ENJOY what I know to be true. THIS JEWELRY STORE IS AMAZING!

name: Corey Biggs
text:
Mobile is full of family traditions. One tradition that has stood strong, across the generations, is shopping at Goldstein’s, Mobile’s oldest jewelry store since 1879.

Goldstein’s has an exquisite selection of fine jewelry and watches. You can also shop for unique gifts, that is sure to please that hard-to-buy-for person in your life.

Wether you are purchasing diamonds and gemstones, precious metals, or gift accessories, the welcoming staff at Goldstein’s will be right there to assist you in your selection.

Goldstein’s premier services include jewelry repair, custom jewelry creations, and engraving.

Goldstein gives back to the community with its tradition of sharing, and support of organizations such as; The Boys and Girls club of South Alabama, and Penelope House.

My first purchase from Goldstein’s was 16 years ago with the purchase of an engagement ring.  It was the beginning of my family, as well as my tradition of shopping for family and friend at Goldstein’s.

Make shopping Goldstein your tradition, as Goldstein’s makes service to you, theirs!

resp.text: Thank you, Corey, for being a part of our family tradition!

text: Went in with a friend to ring shop for her, came out with my ring being resized, redipped, and refreshed! The staff were amazing, patient, and not pushy at all. name: Kaitlyn Parker
text: I had a great experience with Goldsteins jewelry and will definitely go there again. They have a large selection of many top jewelry brands at good prices. The staff was extremely friendly and helpful and they listened to what I was looking for and helped me find it without being too pushy. They even were nice enough to offer to clean a ring that I did not even purchase at their store and I've never seen it as shiny and pretty as after they gave it a complimentary cleaning! They answered all my questions and were just so helpful and knew what they wet selling. They have even sent me a personal handwritten post card in the mail to see how I was liking my new bracelet I purchased and to inform me of a upcoming sale they were having. I would definitely recommend Goldsteins jewelry to everyone. They are a very nice helpful and their location is convenient. I would definitely suggest going by and giving them a visit.   I'm sure they could find what you're looking for!

resp.text: Kaitlyn, thank you for the support, and really appreciate the wonderful review. We strive to maintain our relationship with our customers!

name: Dana Carthen
text: Great customer service. I Iove the results of my wedding ring repair.

resp.text: Thanks, Dana!  I'm so glad you're happy with your ring.

name: Mona Wade
text: I love Goldstein’s, o have only been a customer three times total, but it does not matter if your spending hundreds plus, or a mere twenty two dollars, they treat you like your royalty. Angela has helped me on my two most recent visits, one just a purchase of a little over seven hundred, but she listened and understood how much that purchase met and she worked with me to make it happen in a very Speical way. Most recent I was in the store looking for a replacement chain, sterling silver for my granddaughter, who has struggles with speical needs, Angela found the perfect little affordable chain to fit our needs, and even added a little piece of chain, so she could adjust it on her neck, didn’t charge us for her quick fix of placing the small charm on the necklace, that met so much to my granddaughter, I only paid for the small chain and we were out the door, as I was leaving she offered me a water for the road. That is such wonderful service, the kind you don’t get anywhere else. That charm was left at another store for over two weeks, just to be placed on a chain, when it wasn’t ready for my granddaughter’s flight, the jewelry store had a hard time finding our ticket and never seemed to mind, because we were only spending less then fifty. If ever I spend thousands, and I hope to do that one day soon, I will spend it at Goldstein ‘s. Thank Goldstein’s for caring about the person and not the dollar amount, and a special thank you to Angela, a fine representative of the Goldstein’s name. Sincerely, Mona Wade

resp.text: Mona, everyone who walks through our door matters! We look at all of our customers as they are family! I will be sure to let Angela know that you really appreciated her help! She is a great asset to our Goldstein's family!  We look forward to seeing you again soon, thank you so much for the kind review!

text: Staff so friendly !  Great place to shop

name: ashley
text: After researching jeweler's who specialized in custom jewelry design, my husband and I were very impressed with the reviews we read about Goldstein's. Unfortunately, our experience was nothing like the reviews.  We wanted to redesign/enhance my wedding set and explained what we were looking for. The store manager took one look at my set and informed me it would cost us more money to custom design a new wedding set using my original stones. She then proceeded to show us settings and told us if we wanted to use my diamond they could put it in one of the settings, made a "joke" that I could have two sets and decide which set I wanted to wear based on the outfit I was wearing. Showed us countless settings then informed us to draw a picture of what we had in mind and bring it in.  Throughout the experience, a price point was never discussed.  We feel the store manager made a judgement call on what we could afford based on my current wedding set.  Needless to say, we left feeling very disappointed.

resp.text: We apologize for your experience, Ashley, whilst an apology will regrettably not alter the outcome or your experience, I do extend it will all sincerity. It is through feedback that we are able to maintain and, when necessary, improve the service that we provide to our valued customers. Is there any way you could call us to discuss? You can reach us at 251-460-9050.

name: Alan Martin
text: Always,helpful always great services  wouldn't go anywhere else especially,for pandora

resp.text: Alan, thank you for the wonderful review! We take pride in helping others find that perfect piece!

resp.text: I really don't understand this rating.  This individual is in Utah and has absolutely no connection with our business.  If we offended you, we're sorry.  However, the only way we can take payment from so far away is via credit card and beginning questions regarding if we make shipments put up a big red flag with the credit card companies.  This is no excuse for the response you received.  We do ship to known customers all over the country.  I apologize if you were offended.  Richard

text: If I could negative a thousand I would. Someone at this store stole my bracelet I ordered online to be sent to this store. Ordered online for a Christmas gift, got tracking info & it was delivered to the store 12/15. The store gave me 3 different stories about what happened to my product, provided a different tracking number. Customer had the HARDEST time trying to get someone on the phone at the store. This was a Christmas gift. Then customer service is just as bad. Ordered 12/11/2020 & it’s 1/18/2021, I have no product or no refund. I would recommend NEVER ordering from Zales & dealing with the Zales at the Galleria. Worst store EVER.

We've shopped here for years. Their service is great!

text: Do not shop with Sam. She's super rude. She threw away part of a necklace that I had a warranty on because we didn't have the other tiny piece to it. I had to call the district manager in order to get it rectified. She kept interrupting us while we were talking to the assistant manager talking to us in a condescending way. Worst experience ever.

name: Kristina Sims
text: The warranty is bs bc they will replace a 2 carat diamond if lost but not the chain? AFTER we purchased lifetime! The ladies were extremely rude and acted as if they owed the mall. Will it be back!! Don’t trust those people

text: Great Sales Staff. They are very helpful and kind. This time Sam helped me pick out a great present for my wife's birthday. Sam was wonderful and knowledgeable about everything she showed me.

text: Very rude, will not do warranty inspection without an appt nor on Sunday's

text: Customer service is Excellent

name: Rodney Burnes
